Text:
I still don't get it why these are being rar'd?!?  It's a 15 minute show.  

Some of us have NAS servers and don't watch these shows/movies sitting in a computer chair.  I download to a Synology Diskstation with built-in torrent and UPNP services then watch on my 360 or PS3.

While I always appreciate the UL, why the rar?  What is the plus side I'm missing?
